title: Wonder dogs in action
brief_description: Hunting in the Arizona Hills and wilds of America with “the sportsman’s best and most faithful companion”: the Hound. This film documents the behaviour and physicality of American hunt dogs such as the Fox Hound as well at the Irish Setter, Pointer, French Poodle and Labrador. The film describes each breed’s good points as hunters and retrievers, “over land and in water”.
